text: bhadratayeate nul nurra sesam at pala tuntukalakki peatticcukalannavaleppeale ninnalakarut. oru janavibhagam marrearu janavibhagattekkal kututal netanayi ninnal ninnalute sapathannale parasparam vancaneapadhiyakkarut. atilute allahu ninnale pariksikkuka matraman ceyyunnat. uyirttelunnelpu nalil ninnal bhinniccirunna karyannalute nijasthiti ninnalkkavan vyaktamakkittarikatanne ceyyum
